name: Earth Defender Web
body:
### Earth Defender Web!
This re-implementation of Earth Defender is now using web technologies. In this case I use [PixiJS](http://www.pixijs.com/) to manage all the visual stuff and [HowlerJS](https://howlerjs.com/) to manage the audio files.

### Authors and Contributors
The re-implementation was in charge of Michel Llorens (@Michotastico) with base on the work of Daniel Calder√≥n S.

### Support or Contact
Problems with this? Try the contact form from my website [here](http://michotastico.github.io/) and asap I will answer you.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
